column3: School of Engineering and Applied Science
column5: Administered jointly through the Department of Computer Science and the Department of Engineering Management & Systems Engineering, the Master of Science in Data Analytics aims to address the growing demand for professionals skilled in big data and data analytics in government, industry and research organizations.Through courses led by top faculty members at the School of Engineering & Applied Science and the School of Business, this program is conducted in small cohorts and covers topics in computer science, business analytics and systems engineering while focusing on the foundations of analytics from a technical engineering perspective.Students choose from two tracks: Computer Science or Engineering Management & Systems Engineering.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 2 years full time, 3 years part time
